content: make a splash with the **hooked on the sea 6 crochet ocean animal amigurumi pattern collection** this fun and playful set includes 6 adorable crochet ocean animal amigurumi patterns made with the signature wheat stitch™ 1 get ready to stitch up something seriously cute with the **wheat stitch™ clam** this little amigurumi sea cutie is worked in the round using the lovely wheat stitch 2 to give the outer shell its soft textured look you ll start by crocheting the outer shell then switch to a lighter shade to create the inner shell and join them together after that it s time to slip_stitch the top and bottom shells closed just like a real clam add a playful ruffle around the front edge and nestle in a tiny crochet pearl for the perfect finishing touch one of the great things about crocheting amigurumi is the freedom to experiment with any yarn you love from fingering weight to bulky simply adjust your hook size to match your yarn choice and have fun creating all kinds of sea friends a video tutorial is included with this pattern crochet hook g 4 0mm -
